About Us

Energy Independence
starts with us

As a third generation family owned and operated business, Rainbow Solar & Electric is driven by an unparalleled understanding of the roofing, solar, and battery needs of today’s homes. We’re your trusted partner in sustainable energy solutions. With a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence, we’re dedicated to transforming homes across Southern California into energy-efficient and eco-friendly spaces.

Our Vision

To lead the charge towards a sustainable future by empowering homes with efficient solar and battery solutions, ensuring a cleaner and greener environment for generations to come.

Our Mission

We are committed to providing top-quality solar installations and home battery systems, coupled with exceptional customer service and personalized solutions, to enable homeowners across Southern California to reduce their carbon footprint and achieve energy independence.

Get a Free Estimate

Our Services

Powering Your Future With more than just solar

Residential Solar Panels

Save money and gain energy independence with solar panels on your home. You'll no longer rely on utility companies and can say goodbye to monthly energy bills.
Learn More

Battery Storage

Solar panels combined with home batteries put you in charge of your energy future and contributes to lowering your energy expenses.
Learn More

Roofing

As a solar roofing contractor, we carry a roofing license and replace all necessary roofing material underneath the section of the roof where your solar panels are to be installed.
Learn More

Our Services

Powering Your Future With Solar & Battery Storage

Get a Free Estimate

Residential Solar

Harness solar energy for your home with our tailored residential solar solutions.

Solar Installation

Expert installation of solar panels to power your home sustainably.

Solar Panel Service

Efficient service to ensure optimal performance and longevity of your solar panels.

Roofing Contractors

Professional roofing services to seamlessly integrate solar panels while enhancing durability.

New Homes

Incorporate sustainable energy solutions from the ground up in your new home construction.

Customer Support

Our team is your dedicated resource for expert guidance on solar and battery solutions.

Why Choose Us

Unlock top-tier solar & storage solutions

Trusted Expertise

At Rainbow Solar & Electric, our seasoned professionals bring years of experience and expertise to every project.

Superior Quality

We pride ourselves on using only the highest quality materials and industry-leading technologies in all our installations.

Personalized Solutions

We understand that every home is unique, which is why we offer personalized solutions designed to meet your specific energy requirements and budget.

Roofing Legacy

With our roofing license and extensive experience, we prioritize the integrity of your entire roofing system. Before installing solar panels, we meticulously inspect and, if necessary, replace any roofing materials in the designated area.

Top rated

Your trusted partner

Count on us as your reliable energy ally. We take pride in being a leading solar panel installer, backed by a thousand 5-star customer reviews and a multitude of awards, certifications, and accreditations. If you’re looking for a dependable energy partner, Rainbow Solar & Electric is your #1 pick.

Get a Free Estimate

Sustainability

Why California Home Energy Management is Crucial

For California homeowners investing in solar and batteries, the decision holds immense value in securing a sustainable future while enjoying immediate benefits. By harnessing solar energy and incorporating home battery systems, we not only reduce our reliance on traditional power sources but also take control of our energy consumption, leading to significant savings on utility bills.

Embracing solar and batteries isn’t just an investment in your home, it’s a commitment to sustainability that brings both financial and environmental rewards for years to come.
